nodes.text: Vom Dresid was a male Human Major of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. In 3638 BBY he was stationed on the Valor-class cruiser Gav Daragon, where he escorted an important figure to a private meeting with the Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh.
Major Dresid appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel during the introductory cutscene for the "Scum and Villainy" operation on Republic side.
